Plot: A year after the death of their youngest daughter, a family still tries to cope and grieve in their own ways, but a knock on the door stirs up trouble and complicates their already strained relationships.
Title: Goodbye
Writer: Richard L. Haas III, Franco Luzzi (story), Franco Luzzi
Actors: Gary Pettinella, Randa Karambelas, Tess Hintelmann, Emily Pettinella
